contentList.content: You are immune to being <LSTag Tooltip="CharmedGroup">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.

Gain an additional bonus action.

While in combat, you heal [1] every turn, and restore [2] Ki Point(s).
Strike out with a spinning kick at all nearby foes, making separate <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against each target.
